revised_title: On the Kreatinin of Urine and Kreatiuins Derived from Dehydration
tldr: The author investigates the reducing agents in normal human urine and identifies kreatinin as one of the main components. They develop a method to isolate and analyze kreatinin, discovering its properties and its role in urine. The study also compares natural and artificial kreatinins, highlighting their differences in composition and reducing action.
